title: HELP ON MONOGRAM/LOGO
content:
Does anyone have information on this type of logo/monogram.  
I it is on an old oak door purchased in Provance France in 2005, circa 1800 +/-.

Many thanks for your help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122003125im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/img_0046%20(3)_5442.jpg)
author: gda123

comments.content:
Didn’t you already do this. I told you it was a “T&D” monogram in the Lombardic tradition but I may be wrong. You need to keep the size of you files smaller so we can see the file! As it is it looks like skin cancer.

Michael

Gary,

Are you aware that you have posted this question, and these images 3 times now?  
Please let us know if you are having problems with posting threads and images.

thanks
